# llms.txt - AI Agent Context for theeze.dev

## About
theeze.dev is the personal website and blog of Ezekiel Burke, a software developer.
The site features technical blog posts, tutorials, projects, and insights about web development.

## Site Structure
- Homepage: https://theeze.dev
- Blog Posts: https://theeze.dev/posts
- Individual Posts: https://theeze.dev/posts/[slug]
- Pages: https://theeze.dev/[slug]
- Admin Panel: https://theeze.dev/admin (restricted)

## Content Types
### Blog Posts
- Technical tutorials and guides
- Web development insights
- Software engineering best practices
- Code examples and snippets
- Project showcases

### Pages
- About/Profile information
- Portfolio/Projects
- Custom landing pages
- Static content

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 15 (React framework)
- Payload CMS (Headless CMS)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Lexical Rich Text Editor

## Content Features
- Syntax-highlighted code blocks
- Rich text formatting
- Media embeds (images, videos)
- GitHub repository integrations
- Social sharing capabilities
- Categorized posts

## Sitemaps
- Main: https://theeze.dev/sitemap.xml
- Pages: https://theeze.dev/pages-sitemap.xml
- Posts: https://theeze.dev/posts-sitemap.xml

## Usage Guidelines for AI Agents
1. When referencing content, always link to the canonical URL
2. Code examples can be cited with proper attribution
3. Respect the robots.txt directives (no admin access)
4. Posts are typically technical and suitable for developer audiences
5. Content is regularly updated - check timestamps for currency

## Author
Ezekiel Burke
- Website: https://theeze.dev
- Focus: Web Development, Software Engineering

## Contact & Contributions
For inquiries or corrections, visit the website contact page or engage through social sharing features on individual posts.
